description: To gain income report date and provide file link if the income report is ready to be downloaded

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to use api. Visit for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Required signature for api access, used to verify merchant account's authenticity

parameters.name: income_report_id
parameters.description: The identifier for income report file request

response_fields.name: id
response_fields.description: The identifier for income statement file request

response_fields.name: file_url
response_fields.description: Link to download income report file
